For those living outside 30318, text FINDFOOD and send it to 888-976-2232.", "email": "", "url": "https://collinsmemorialumc.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2220 Bolton Road Northwest", "address_2": null, "city": "Bolton", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30318", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8164065, "longitude": -84.4658714}, "phones": [{"number": "(470) 301-1092", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
